forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms during the evening followed by a few showers overnight. Low 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Fog early, then cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with some evening fog. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
